subject: p18309149
History: New chest tube placement, evaluation for pleural effusions.
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, the patient has received a right pigtail catheter inserted in the pleural cavity. Extent of the previously present right pleural effusion has decreased. However, substantial portion of effusion remains. No complications, notably no pneumothorax. Unchanged appearance of the left lung and the cardiac silhouette.
